name: EN/AI
slogan: High end activewear brand with a core focus on function and sustainability
description:
Currently in the sampling development stage, we are creating premium activewear that has a core focus on function and sustainability. Creating conscious clothing that can support / re-align the body whilst being worn and create real self body awareness. 

"INTRODUCING THE NEXT GENERATION OF PREMIUM ACTIVEWEAR. WE ARE BRINGING ANOTHER DIMENSION TO THE FASHION WORLD BY BRIDGING THE GAP BETWEEN HIGH END DESIGN AND FUNCTION.
WE BELIEVE WE ALL HAVE AN OBLIGATION TO CREATE POSITIVE CHANGE AND WE ARE AT THE HEART OF A MOVEMENT COMMITTED IN DOING SO."

team.name: Natasha Aimee
team.bioHtml:
Art Director / Fashion Stylist. (www.natashaaimee.com)
Building a startup company - high end activewear with a core focus on function and sustainability.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Natasha Aimee
team.bioHtml:
Art Director / Fashion Stylist. (www.natashaaimee.com)
Building a startup company - high end activewear with a core focus on function and sustainability.

jobs.title: Co-Founder
jobs.description:
Looking for a co-founder to launch a high design, sustainable activewear line. Ideally the co-founder will have an interest in luxury fashion / activewear and wellness sectors. A co-founder to join us on this journey to disrupt the fashion market and bring something completely niche to the market. 

Currently at the sampling stage with the womenswear collection, it would be great to get a co-founder who was able to get stuck in - assisting with creating pitch documents / help build the marketing strategy / sourcing / look for investors / attend networking events etc. Someone hard working and able to work with passion and drive. 

Self funding so looking for investors.

Aiming for B-Corp.

With the right team, we can accomplish anything.
